attributes.action: Open an official investigation into the Paul McCartney died in 1966 rumour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the late 1960's a rumour spread like wildfire that Paul McCartney had died in a car crash and was replaced by a lookalike. Many to this day still believe in the conspiracy.

I feel it is only fare to us Paul McCartney fans for you, our government to open an official investigation into this and give us the truth - like they are doing with Princess Diana now in Paris.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
